named-query.name: EmailConfirmation.getLatestPatientToken
named-query.query: SELECT c.token FROM EmailConfirmation c WHERE c.patient.email = ?1 ORDER BY c.createdAt DESC

named-query.name: EmailConfirmation.updateConfirmedAt
named-query.query: UPDATE EmailConfirmation c SET c.confirmedAt = ?2 WHERE c.token = ?1

named-query.name: Patients.enablePatientAccount
named-query.query: UPDATE Patient p SET p.enabled = TRUE WHERE p.email = ?1
